::Ramulus::

Ramulus nods at the warning. He had not know that, but it was just another 
strange thing in the war.

"Allright," Ramulus says, then grins, "I don't think you could kill me 
anyways."

The Maximal turns to face Gekkidama, ready to fight. The clock was ticking, 
and the shuttle would take off in less than 5 minutes....
